**Release: `r due_dc$release[3]`**  
**Due: `r due_dc$due[3]`**

Often a better way to understand and present data as a graph. In this chapter, you'll learn the essential skills of data visualization using the ggplot2 package, and you'll see how the dplyr and ggplot2 packages work closely together to create informative graphs.

* Go here to start: https://campus.datacamp.com/courses/introduction-to-the-tidyverse/data-visualization
* Sign up with your Wayne State email address if you haven't done yet
* **The due date** is specified in this page as well as your DataCamp dashboard. Be sure to make it in time!
